body: Solo me gusta la historia loli yuri
a lot of anal in this one lol

Average for me, 5/10, there's some good art and a debut artist. My favorite this month was actually the last one from motofumi. I also don't feel good about that continued one from nobori. Anyways, enjoy it oniisans! Take care all <3 edit: thanks for that, I wrote it before I went to sleep, it's easy to mistake artists but yeah that's clearly motofumi artstyle

Side note to @lolitome Usakun is the one who does the cartoons at the end of every LO, you can even see it tagged on the contents page. So unless your fav is some comedic cartoons, I think you meant your fav is from Motofumi :p. Sorry for being pedantic, but it makes it easier to appreciate art when everyone knows who/what their talking about.

Hmmm, not quite sure about this one yet. I like and dislike parts I wouldn’t have expected too. I’ll put some important notes here so I won’t hit the character limit on the next one. Quite a bit of anal/anal focus in this one, really not my thing. Hiroyuki still has an obsession with fat old guys, a damn shame cause they draws girls almost perfectly; also, their story was too short, and NTR I think? The story that starts out with a girl in a bunny suit and then immediately strips her is the embodiment of the type of “costume” sex I hate: Why put a girl (especially a loli) in a costume if you’re not gonna do her in it? Costume/uniform sex is hot. Not a fan of masks so The one with the sleeping girl was kinda off putting too. Like usual, a number of stories suffer from being too short. Finally, that Nobori sequel is immensely disappointing, it easily could’ve been long enough to get the father involved again, if not just have a FFM scene. My positive notes and final rating will be next.
Fair pack, I liked 3 of them.
It was fairly good,  I like more than 3 stories on this
